title: Meditation Fundamentals
subtitle: Building a practice that actually works
description: Cut through the confusion and build a meditation practice that fits your life. This course covers the core techniques, common obstacles, and how to make meditation a sustainable habit rather than another thing you fail at.

modules.title: Core Techniques
modules.description: The fundamental practices that everything builds on

whatYouLearn: Understand what meditation is and isn't
Learn the core techniques that underpin all meditation
Know when and how to deepen your practice

questions.question: What is the goal of meditation?
What should you do when you notice your mind has wandered?
options: Gently return attention to the object of focus without judgment

questions.question: What is 'noting' in meditation?
options: Mentally labeling experiences briefly to maintain awareness

questions.question: How should you work with sleepiness during meditation?
options: Open eyes, sit up straighter, or try standing/walking meditation

questions.question: What makes a meditation habit sustainable?
options: Consistent short sessions, same time/place, realistic expectations
Only meditating when you feel like it

questions.question: When is the best time to meditate?
options: Whatever time you'll actually do it consistently
